welcome_subtitle: Easy-to-use conversion tool for GTA V vehicle assets to FiveM Ready assets!
drag_instruction: ⬇️ Drag and drop a folder here ⬇️
select_mod_instruction: Drag and drop or browse to a folder containing extracted GTA mod files
meta_missing_warning: ⚠️ Warning: vehicles.meta missing or malformed. Using fallback model name: convertedcar
mod_instructions:
1. Open the mod's `dlc.rpf` file using CodeWalker or OpenIV.
2. Extract all relevant files (e.g., `.meta`, `.ytd`, `.yft`, `.ydr`) to a new folder.
3. Place all these extracted files into a single folder.
4. Drag that folder into the box below or use the Browse button.
5. Confirm to begin automatic conversion to FiveM format.
